refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A bibliomixed is an entry in a bibliography. The contents of bibliomixed includes all necessary punctuation for formatting. Presentation systems usually display all of the elements in a bibliomixed.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: A bibliomixed entry is cooked. In addition to named fields, it can contain interspersed text to provide punctuation and other formatting information.
The processing system is generally expected to present each and every element in the entry, and all interspersed #PCDATA, in the order in which it occurs.
